title: Lamb Shanks in Tomato Sauce
introduction: Lamb Shanks in Tomato Sauce is a delectable dish where tender lamb shanks are slowly braised in a rich tomato and wine sauce. Ideal for a hearty meal, this flavorful dish brings out the succulence of lamb perfectly complemented by aromatic rosemary and garlic.

instructions.description: In a Dutch oven large enough to hold the shanks in a single layer, or another deep, heavy pot with a tight-fitting lid, heat the oil. Brown the meat on all sides, about 15 minutes. Spoon off the excess fat. Sprinkle the shanks with salt and pepper.

Add the garlic and rosemary to the pan and cook 1 minute. Add the wine and bring to a simmer. Add the tomatoes and broth. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and cook the shanks, turning them occasionally, about 1 1/2 hours or until the meat is fork tender and comes away easily from the bone.
Sprinkle with parsley and serve hot.
